title: CPC increases prices for Petrol & Diesel; Fuel limitations for series of vehicles lifted
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation has decided to increase fuel prices with effect from midnight on Monday (18).
95 Octane (Euro 4) Petrol : Up by Rs. 90/- (New Price: Rs. 373/-)
Lanka Super Diesel 4 Star Euro 4 : Up by Rs. 75/- (New Price: Rs. 329/-)
The limits imposed cars, three-wheelers, motorcycles, vans, and SUVs has been lifted with effect from Monday (18).
CPC increases prices for Petrol & Diesel; Fuel limitations for series of vehicles lifted
